meanings.definition: Bifidums: a type of bacteria commonly found in the human gut.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that bifidums are important for our digestion.
meanings.sent2: Many studies have shown the benefits of bifidums in maintaining gut health.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine little bifidums dancing happily in my stomach after a good meal.
meanings.sent4: The bifidums in our gut are like tiny helpers keeping everything in balance.
meanings.sent5: Picture a bustling city in your gut where bifidums are the hardworking citizens.

meanings.definition: Bifidums: plural form of bifidum, referring to a specific strain of probiotic bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The supplement contains various strains of bifidums to support gut health.
meanings.sent2: It is important to read the labels to ensure the presence of bifidums in the probiotic.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly told my friend that my secret to health is consuming a daily dose of bifidums.
meanings.sent4: In the world of probiotics, bifidums are like the superheroes fighting off bad bacteria.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a team of bifidums marching into your gut, ready to battle any invaders.

meanings.definition: Bifidums: the presence of bifidum bacteria in a probiotic supplement.
meanings.sent1: The effectiveness of the probiotic is directly linked to the bifidums it contains.
meanings.sent2: Consuming bifidums regularly can help maintain a healthy balance of gut flora.
meanings.sent3: I playfully told my sister that the secret ingredient in my smoothie is bifidums.
meanings.sent4: In the world of supplements, bifidums are like the stars that shine the brightest.
meanings.sent5: Visualize a jar filled with vibrant bifidums, ready to boost your digestive health.
